content.text:
# 25th AARP Movies for Grownups Awards

The 25th AARP Movies for Grownups Awards, presented by AARP: The Magazine, will honor films and television series released in 2025. The nominations were announced on November 19, 2025, with One Battle After Another leading the nominations with eight.
Created by and about people over the age of 50, the winners will be announced on January 10, 2026. The ceremony will take place at the Beverly Wilshire Hotel in Los Angeles and will be hosted by Alan Cumming. The event will later premiere on Great Performances on PBS on February 22, 2026.
Adam Sandler will receive the Career Achievement Award.
Awards

Winners will be listed first and highlighted in boldface.
